Key Match Events: Ryan Mendes of Cape Verde takes the penalty and scores in the 88th minute to give Cape Verde a 1-0 lead
Babacar Niasse of Mauritania receives a yellow card for a foul in the 87th minute
Pre-Game Insights: Cape Verde is considered one of the 'underdogs' but has continued to shock everyone
Cape Verde finished atop Group B with victories against Ghana, Mozambique, and a draw against Egypt
Post-Match Reflections: Cape Verde qualifies for the Quarter-finals of the 2023 Africa Cup of Nations
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match ends with Cape Verde winning 1-0 in extra time
Substitutions were made for both teams, including Jovane Benchimol, Willy Semedo, and others
Others: The match takes place at the Félix Houphouët Boigny stadium in Abidjan on Monday, 29 January 2023
